name: OrangeMantra
description:
OrangeMantra has come a long way since its inception almost two decades ago, and stands as a reliable digital transformation consulting partner for enterprises, small businesses, and startups. Our service portfolio is a diverse one, encompassing a wide range of digital transformation services comprising the following:
 
Web development
Mobile app development
E-commerce development
Enterprise application development
Big data and analytics
Product engineering
Software engineering for cloud platforms, and more
 
Over the years, we have served a global clientele from varied industry verticals including healthcare, automotive, e-commerce, retail, manufacturing, public sector, media and publishing, and more. A successful track record along with a team of experts with versatile skills and experience make us capable of delivering value-adding services for the clients. Further, we follow a proven methodology that focuses on agile approach to deliver projects within timelines and up to the satisfaction levels of the clients. We are also acclaimed for the top-notch solutions that propel business growth and offer value for money.
